background.orientation: Database operations should be properly isolated during testing.
background.purpose: Test database record insertion and retrieval with proper test isolation.
background.citation: Ensure database record isolation during tests
background.hypothesis: Using a database fixture will allow proper isolation of database tests and prevent test interference.

independent_variable.name: User Record
independent_variable.description: The user record to be inserted into the database

dependent_variable.name: Record Retrieval
dependent_variable.description: The retrieved user record from the database

validation_procedures.description: Verify that the record is correctly retrieved from the database
validation_procedures.name: verify_record_retrieval
steps: Create a fixture that sets up a test database
Insert a user record into the database
Retrieve the record using the ID
Verify that the retrieved record matches the inserted one
Clean up the test database after the test

control_variables.name: Database Type
control_variables.description: The type of database being used for testing

control_variables.name: Database Mode
control_variables.description: The mode the database is operating in

steps: Set up a SQLite in-memory database
Create a users table with appropriate schema
Retrieve the user record by ID
Verify all fields match the expected values
Close and clean up the database connection
